GR13goramaru:3: * yac candraprabhavaṃ varāmbaragataṃ yal liṅgasaṃjñaṃ jalaṃ sa prāṇas tadadhaḥ sthiraṃ ca kamalaṃ dhatte mukhordhvaṃ hṛdi // 1.1
GR13goramaru:4: * baddhvā kumbhakam ātmagāḍharacitaṃ tad brahmanāḍīgataṃ hy ānetuṃ vadane ṣaḍadhvagakalā saivaṃvidhā sāraṇā // 1.2]
GR13goramaru:8: * saṃprāptaṃ hanurandhramūlavidhinā yac candratoyaṃ mukhe tat sarvaṃ ravikālarūpasadane rakṣet parā sāraṇā // 2.2]
GR13goramaru:11: * nṛtyan nityordhvajihvo yadi pibati pumān vaktradhārāmṛtaughaṃ susvādaṃ śītalāṅgaṃ duritabhayaharaṃ kṣutpipāsāvināśi // 3.1
GR13goramaru:12: * piṇḍasthairyaṃ yad asmād bhavati bata mahāmṛtyurogā dravante daurbhāgyaṃ yāti nāśaṃ harati viṣajarāṃ yāti kāle bhramitvā // 3.2]
GR13goramaru:15: * jihvāgraṃ tv atha rājadantavivaraṃ nītvā tato ghaṇṭikāṃ saṃsthāpya pratijihvaparva śaśino mārge kalāṃ ca kṣipet // 4.1
GR13goramaru:16: * evaṃsāraṇike patanti ca sudhādhārāḥ punaḥ ṣaṇmukhagāndhārāpy atha tatkalāpamathanaṃ nāḍīmukhojjṛmbhaṇam // 4.2]
GR13goramaru:23: * nāsāpaścimamārgavāhapavanāt prāṇe 'tidīrghīkṛte candrāmbu pratisāraṇāṃ sukṛtinaḥ prāgghaṇṭikāyāḥ pathaḥ // 6.1
GR13goramaru:24: * siñcan kālaviśālavahnivaśagaṃ bhūtvā sa nāḍīśataṃ tat kāryaṃ kurute punar navatanuṃ jīrṇadrumaskandhavat // 6.2]
GR13goramaru:27: * protkṣiptaṃ vṛṣaṇasya golakayugaṃ madhye dhvajaṃ proddhvajaṃ nityordhve bata śaṅkhasāraṇavidhau vaktraṃ vidheyaṃ nijam // 7.1
GR13goramaru:28: * sarvasthānaśarīrabandhanavaśāt skandhoddhṛtānāṃ yathā nāḍīnāṃ mukhataḥ sudhānidhijalaṃ siñcann adho gacchati // 7.2]
GR13goramaru:35: * paścād āsanaśuddhavātanikarān ādāya kaṇṭhavraṇāt saṃsthāpyā ravimaṇḍale tu bhujagī saṃbhūtanāḍītrayāt // 9.1
GR13goramaru:36: * devī madhyapathoditā prakurute kampaṃ tato mūrchanāṃ dūrakarṣaṇadarśanaṃ śrutigaṇāṃś cānyā mahāsāraṇā // 9.2]
GR13goramaru:40: * tatraivāṅgulibhir nipīḍya kramaśaḥ śāntiṃ mano mārutaṃ candro yāti raviṃ tataś ca bhuvane tulyā mahāsāraṇā // 10.2
GR13goramaru:41: * sūryāntaḥ śaśivīcidantavadanaprāntaplavaughoragī saṃprāpte pavanātisaṅgaharaṇe kṣipraṃ tato dhāvitā // 10.3
GR13goramaru:42: * śrīmanmadhyapathāntato vidadhatī kampādi kopānvitā tasyaivāśrayayāyino 'pi śaśino dattā sudhā saṃmatā // 10.4
GR13goramaru:43: * ādau śoṣaṇiko 'tra sāraṇam ataḥ kāryaṃ mahāsāraṇaṃ kartavyaṃ pratisāraṇaṃ ca guruṇā nirdiṣṭamārgaṃ kramāt // 10.5
GR13goramaru:44: * paścād eva ca śaṅkhasāraṇavidhau kāryaṃ mahāsāraṇaṃ sammūrchā vitatākṛtiḥ pratidinaṃ velātrayaṃ dīyatām // 10.6
GR13goramaru:45: * ākuñcyāgajakāmarūpam acalaṃ bandhatvajātaṃ tanau nātyūrdhve caturaṅgulāgravidite sthāne hṛdā prāṇite // 10.7
GR13goramaru:46: * dantair bandhurite ca vātayugale praśleṣaṇāśleṣaṇāt nābhigranthivimokṣapātasahaje mārge manaḥsiddhayaḥ // 10.8
GR13goramaru:47: * dūrākāravisarpite ca pavane nābheś ca mārgasthite bandheṣu triṣu satsu so 'pi śithile madhyaprabodhe sati // 10.9
GR13goramaru:48: * kṣipraṃ ca dhriyate dvipīṭhamaruto 'py ūrdhvakramākarṣaṇe saṃyukto gaticittaśoṣaṇam ataḥ prāpye 'nile tiṣṭhati // 10.10
GR13goramaru:49: * mūle mūlordhvacakre vṛṣaṇakulatale vahnimātaṅgakūle kampakṣobhabhramāḍhye dhvanitaparicayaṃ gharmapātordhvaroma // 10.11
GR13goramaru:50: * bhūmityāgaṃ kavitvaṃ parapuraviśanaṃ vaśyam ākarṣaṇaṃ ca hy evaṃ vā cetanāptā prabhavati nikhilā khecaratvapratiṣṭhā // 10.12
GR13goramaru:51: * dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca tat // 10.13
GR13goramaru:52: * hṛdaye parame dhāmni madhye tu ravicandramāḥ // 10.14
GR13goramaru:53: * nādaṃ tu taṃ gṛhītvā ca caitanyaṃ tatra yojayet // 10.15
GR13goramaru:54: * dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca tat // 10.16
GR13goramaru:59: * vivaraś ca tṛtīyaḥ syāc chaṅkhaśabdaś caturthakaḥ // 10.21
GR13goramaru:64: * dhvanitena vinā yas tu nādaś caivam apaṇḍitaḥ // 10.26
GR13goramaru:69: * jīvaś caivāgnidāhaḥ syān mokṣaḥ samaraso bhavet // 10.31
GR13goramaru:73: * pañcame vāci kāmitvaṃ ṣaṣṭhe bhūmiṃ parityajet // 10.35
GR13goramaru:74: * saptame dūram ālokya cāṣṭame vajravad bhavet // 10.36
GR13goramaru:76: * pṛthvīmadhye bhavet pṛthvī cāpām āpas tathaiva ca // 10.38
GR13goramaru:77: * tejomadhye bhavet tejo vāyur vāyau pralīyate // 10.39
GR13goramaru:80: * tatrārūḍho yadā yogī prāpnuyāt paramaṃ padam // 10.42]
GR13goramaru:81: ayaṃ prakṛtibhedaḥ pṛthvī āpaḥ tejaḥ vāyuḥ ākāśaś ca iti śarīre pañcaguṇāḥ mahābhūtāni bhavanti tatraiva tāni pañcavidhāni bhavanti // 11
GR13goramaru:82: asthi māṃsaṃ tvak nāḍī romāṇi iti pañcaguṇā pṛthivī // 12
GR13goramaru:84: kṣudhā tṛṣṇā nidrā ālasyaṃ kāntiś ca iti pañcaguṇaṃ tejaḥ // 14
GR13goramaru:85: dhāvanaṃ valganam ākuñcanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ nirodhaś ceti pañcaguṇo vāyuḥ // 15
GR13goramaru:86: rāgo dveṣo lajjā bhayaṃ mohaś ceti pañcaguṇa ākāśaḥ iti pañcaguṇālaṅkṛtāni pañcatattvāni // 16
GR13goramaru:87: śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rasaḥ rūpaṃ gandhaś ceti pañca bhūtaguṇāḥ // 17
GR13goramaru:94: asthisaṃcayaṃ ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śatatrayam asty asya prāṇena saṃbandhaḥ // 24
GR13goramaru:99: vātaḥ prāṇaprakṛtiḥ pittaṃ hutāśanodbhūtaṃ śleṣmā nirodhāt bhavati // 29
GR13goramaru:100: tvak asṛk māṃsaṃ medaḥ asthi majjā śukraṃ prāṇo jīvaḥ śaktiḥ iti daśa dhātavaḥ // 30
GR13goramaru:101: prāṇarandhradvayaṃ locanarandhradvayaṃ karṇarandhradvayaṃ mukharandhradvayam utsargarandhradvayam iti daśa dvārāṇi // 31
GR13goramaru:102_0: atha daśamadvāraṃ dvividhaṃ śukramārgam amṛtaṃ kālamārgaś ceti brahmadaṇḍamūle raviśaśimadhye
GR13goramaru:102_1: bhagākāram asti tasmād āgatabrahmadaṇḍāśritaṃ paścimaliṅgam asti paścimaśabdena sthānam
GR13goramaru:103: puruṣāṇāṃ retomārgaḥ strīṇāṃ rajomārgaḥ sahaiva tena brahmadaṇḍarekhāśritapuṣpasamaye sarvavyāpakanāḍīsamūhāgataṃ kāminīrajaḥ sravati // 33
GR13goramaru:104: tatraiva kāmaviṣaharanirañjanānāṃ saṃyogaṃ bījapātāt ānandāgamaḥ pralayakālaviṣakālayoḥ kartā nirañjanaś ca iti // 34
GR13goramaru:112: manasy āśrayatāmeti jñeyaṃ śaktitrayaṃ tu tat // 42
GR13goramaru:113: śaktitrayodbhavaṃ bījaṃ bījāt kāmo viṣaṃ tataḥ // 43
GR13goramaru:114: kāmaḥ sṛṣṭitayā prokto viṣaṃ mṛtyupadaṃ bhavet // 44
GR13goramaru:115: kiṃ bahunā kāmaviṣaharanirañjanānāṃ brahmadaṇḍamūlāṅkure nivāsaḥ ebhir yad amukho mokṣaḥ bhasmībhūtasya dehasya punar āgamanakāryaṃ nāsti // 45
GR13goramaru:116: aho mūrkhatā lokasya kecid vadanti śubhāśubhakarmavicchedanaṃ mokṣaḥ // 46
GR13goramaru:123: kecid vadanti susamadṛṣṭinipātalakṣaṇo mokṣaḥ ity evaṃvidhabhāvanāśritalakṣaṇo mokṣo na bhavati // 53
GR13goramaru:124: atha mokṣapadaṃ kathyate yatra sahajasamādhikrameṇa manasā manaḥ samālokyate sa eva mokṣaḥ // 54
GR13goramaru:125: kāmaviṣaharasthānaṃ mānasodbhavaḥ manomadhye kāraṇaṃ kāraṇāt utpattisthitipralayāḥ pravartante // 55
GR13goramaru:129: iti jīvanmuktipadam anena mārgeṇa sthiratvaṃ bhavati // 59
GR13goramaru:130_1: ucyate tatra ādhāragranthaya ekadvitrayaś ceti ekadvitrayāṇāṃ madhye granthīnām upāntare
GR13goramaru:130_2: catuṣpatraṃ padmam adhomukhaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra karṇikāmadhye mṛṇālasūtraparimāṇā śaṅkhāvartā
GR13goramaru:130_3: tatra pravālāṅkurasannibhā dvitrināḍībhūtā kuṇḍalinī śaktiḥ caitanyabījamukhaṃ gatvā suptā // 60
GR13goramaru:136: iḍā ca piṅgalā caiva suṣumnā ca tṛtīyakā // 65
GR13goramaru:139: praṇītā sā hy anekais tu brahmāvartena saṃsthitā // 68
GR13goramaru:140_0: brahmadaṇḍacakreṇāsau kapālakarparaṃ yāvat tasmin kapālakarpare candramaṇḍalāntargataṃ
GR13goramaru:140_1: kapālaliṅgaṃ lampikāsthānordhve 'mṛtadhārām abhisravati mastakamadhye garbhe tiṣṭhati
GR13goramaru:140_2: tad evāmṛtaṃ rājadantamaye śaṅkhinī brahmadaṇḍatale damayitvā sravati // 69
GR13goramaru:141: ekaṃ mukharandhraṃ rājadantāntare etad eva śaṅkhinīmukhaṃ daśamadvāram ity ucyate // 70
GR13goramaru:142_0: yatra ca mūlabhagamaṇḍalānte kuṇḍalinī śaktir vinirgatā tatra vāmabhāgodbhavasomanāḍikā
GR13goramaru:142_1: dakṣiṇabhāgodbhavasūryanāḍikā candro vāmāṅgavyāpakaḥ sūryo dakṣiṇāṅgavyāpakaḥ candro
GR13goramaru:142_2: vāmāṅge vāmanāsāpuṭaṃ sūryo dakṣiṇāṅge dakṣiṇanāsāpuṭam ity evaṃ sūryacandrau vyavasthitau // 71
GR13goramaru:143: yatra mūlakande pavanodayaḥ manasa udayaḥ tapanodayaḥ jīvodayaḥ śabdodayaḥ mātṛkākṣarodayaś ceti // 72
GR13goramaru:150: mūrchitā sā śivaṃ vetti prāṇair evaṃ vyavasthitā // 79
GR13goramaru:151_0: janmāvasthānād adho liṅgaḥ sa cādhārakandajātimadhyasthito guhya ūrdhve bhavati tasyordhve
GR13goramaru:151_2: samāgacchati adhaḥpradeśe maṇipūrakasya dakṣiṇapaścimavarti amedhyasthānam madhye
GR13goramaru:151_3: nābheḥ kandaḥ tatra padmākṛtiḥ tatra śarīranāḍīnām ādhāraḥ kathyate hṛdaye pṛthivītattvaṃ
GR13goramaru:151_4: pītavarṇaṃ madhye kadambagolakākṛti tatra cittaviśrāntisthānaṃ tad eva analacakram
GR13goramaru:151_5: kaṇṭhe codakapravāhapūrṇam ātmatattvaṃ tad viśuddhisthānam tālumadhye dīpaśikhākāraḥ
GR13goramaru:151_6: sadoddyotaḥ tat tejastattvam kapālakandarāṅkure vāyutattvam nāsāgre ākāśatattvam tasyordhve
GR13goramaru:152_0: ājñāsthānam ājñāsthānāntare granthiṣoḍaśāntare amṛtā ṣoḍaśī kalā tadantare vālāgraśatadhāśrayā
GR13goramaru:152_1: ante tasyordhve kalānte binduḥ bindubhedād anantaraṃ śṛṃgāṭakākṛtir mastakasyoddeśas
GR13goramaru:152_2: tasmin cittalayasthānam cittasya śarīrabandhanādvayopetas trailokyavihāraḥ tasyāśritā
GR13goramaru:152_3: jñānaśaktiḥ evaṃ śaktitrayālaṃkṛtaś ciddarpaṇapratibimbaḥ samo vividhabhāvakalākalitaḥ
GR13goramaru:152_4: saṃsāraceṣṭāvalokanakuśalaḥ suptāvasthāyāṃ rūpī jalacandravat dṛśyate yaḥ sa paramātmā
GR13goramaru:152_5: sarvavyāpī maheśvaraḥ caturdaśavidhabhūtagrāmakartā ca iti so 'yaṃ paramātmā // 80
